<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Speaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2636) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ability to communicate with some type of animals (such as bats or arthropods)

</column>

---

You can speak to all [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), not just a particular subset. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on animals (which usually uses the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill).

prerequisite: ability to communicate with some type of animals (such as bats or arthropods)
